New office in Newcastle

Oct 7, 2020 • Dave Rand

After working from our home for over 18 months, last week we officially opened our new office space at 6 Downs Road in Newcastle. Being in the town and close to the sea is lovely, and we hope our location will make it more convenient for customers.

×

Now that we're settled in and ready for business, stop in or give us a call to discuss your computer issues; we're always happy to help.
